brainrots-display.name: Brainrots wandering
brainrots-display.description:
0: All collected brainrots will wander around the screen.
1: Only your selected brainrot will wander around the screen.
2: No brainrots will wander around the screen.

brainrots-in-playlayer.name: Brainrots while playing
brainrots-in-playlayer.description:
If true, hides your collected brainrots while playing a level.
This setting has no effect if the "Brainrots Wandering" setting is set to "2".

brainrots-in-editor.name: Brainrots in editor
brainrots-in-editor.description:
If true, hides your collected brainrots while in the editor.
This setting has no effect if the "Brainrots Wandering" setting is set to "2".
